name: randomness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being random (= happening, done, or chosen by chance rather than according to a plan): The randomness and brutality of the killings is shocking. No one would deny the importance of circumstance and randomness in life.
More examplesFewer examplesThe randomness of each batch of DNA makes its meaning impossible to crack.You manage the randomness by making choices based on the potential risk.Engineers are now exploring the role of randomness in performance enhancement of their products.
